data_table.description: Subjective Memory Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SMF1
variable.description: Q1. Times in past month misplaced items [Subjective Memory Form]

variable.name: SMF2
variable.description: Q2. Times in past month write reminder notes to self [Subjective Memory Form]

variable.name: SMF3
variable.description: Q3. Times in past month trouble remembering recent conversations [Subjective Memory Form]

variable.name: SMF4
variable.description: Q4. Family expressed concern about memory loss [Subjective Memory Form]

variable.name: SMF0AY
variable.description: Q0a. Year Of Completion Date [Subjective Memory Form]
